ValidationRule.description: IF the "Edit Sales Price?" checkbox is TRUE on the Product, Users can edit the Opportunity Product Sales Price for said product.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"ReadyTalk"), Opportunity.RecordTypeId <> '01213000001NeTg', ISCHANGED(UnitPrice), Product2.Edit_Sales_Price__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the Sales Price for this product. Only products with a $0 List Price can be edited. Please enter the original List Price into this field.
